name: Microsoft Solitaire
description: A remake of the original Microsoft Solitaire bundled in Windows Vista and Windows 7.

name: LochNess
description:
In the great classics, the snake game became a must-have from 1998.
Take a dose of nostalgia and play as the famous loch Ness monster in this snake like!

name: Henry Danger: Day of Danger
description: Help Henry Danger to rescue Piper, deal with a nasty computer virus, deactivate a nuclear bomb and more in this full day of danger!

name: Aero Dancing: Secret Mission Disk
description: Aero Dancing: Secret Mission Disk is an expansion disk for the original game Aerowings (the original was called "Aero Dancing" in Japan). There are three modes of play featured in this game: Gallery Mode, Sky Mission Attack mode, and a Free Flight Mode.

name: Pixel Ripped 1978
description:
The golden age of ATARI is back! And now you can live in it!

Pixel Ripped 1978 is a love letter to everything ATARI. In this totally interactable environment in VR, players are caught in the eye of the hurricane in a whacky time-traveling adventure where they are one of the main programmers at ATARI and have to get INSIDE the gaming world to prevent history from being rewritten by a pesky super-villain!

Grab your favorite headset and get ready for some good ol'nostalgia wackiness!

name: Food Dude
description: Food Dude is a cancelled game for the CD-i.

name: Phantom Integration
description: An expanded version of "Phantom of Inferno", containing a new ending.

name: My Little Pony: Mane Merge
description: C’mon everypony, we must save Equestria! A darkness is creeping through the lands, causing chaos to the Earth Ponies of Maretime Bay, through to the Unicorns in Bridlewood, and even to the Pegasi soaring above the clouds in Zephyr Heights. Saddle up and help the Mane 5, Sunny, Izzy, Zipp, Pipp, & Hitch, as they work together to investigate what or who is behind this dark curse.

name: Phantom: Phantom of Inferno
description: Sin descripción

name: Into the Winds: Zen Flowers
description: Into the Winds: Zen Flowers aims to provide a meditative gameplay experience. Take your time to match flowers and watch as the flowers disperses their petals, carried away by the gentle breeze. A down to earth Match-2 puzzle game infused with elements of Zen.

name: Coloring Pixels: Gems and Minerals Pack
description: This Gems and Minerals-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Shiny gems, fascinating minerals and useful ores! Delve into the ground to see what wonders await.

name: Coloring Pixels: Emoji Pack
description: This Emoji themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by emojis popular on IOS and Android devices.

name: Fly Fishing 3D II
description:
The sequel of 'Fly Fishing 3D'! The fly fishing game that exceeded 4 million DL!
Experience our new fly fishing game with overwhelmingly evolved 3D graphics!!
Also, it became more exciting by adding new elements: Underwater camera, new actions, fight scene, and competing with NPCs!

name: Glory Room
description: Glory Room is a Roguelike game that can be played quickly and lightly. It proceeds with stories of the characters who have no choice but to come to the hellish arena. Various items, monsters and traps give you trials. Overcome it and create your own show to defeat the demons and reclaim your glory!

name: Sokoboxes Duo
description: A new game based on Sokoban.

name: The Illusion: Curse
description: The Illusion: Curse Is a horror game made by professional crew In the art of horror. You will have the opportunity to experience one of the most powerful types of psychological horror Based on an environment designed in every detail to be a real hell that makes you terrified.

name: Polaretti
description:
Help the Polaretti Team use their superpowers to overcome the evil Minorca
An exciting adventure is starting in Polarettiland! Minorca is more evil than ever, and this time she is ready to do anything to steal all the fruit. Will the “Polaretti Team” succeed in overcoming her, thanks to your help and their superpowers? Join them in their world, and help make them stronger collecting all the fruit.

name: Balance Weight
description: Arrange your cats and other items to 2 sides of the scale to balance. Sound easy right? But it will blow you mind when you actually solve it.

name: Xiaomei and the Flame Dragon's Fist
description: Save your sister from the darkness in this authentic 16-bit kung fu action game, releasing outside Japan for the first time!

name: The Hero with a Thousand Arms
description: The Hero with a Thousand Arms has created a challenging game where multiple mini-games are running simultaneously on the screen, and the player needs to switch between them to operate. Meanwhile, the other games enter bullet time mode.

name: Steelrising: Marie-Antoinette Cosmetic Pack
description: Dress up in your best attire with the Marie-Antoinette pack. The Marie-Antoinette pack includes a complete outfit for Aegis with hat, jacket, boots and trousers.

name: SCP Containment Breach
description: Game in the genre survival horror, in which you will have to try to survive.

name: Pac-In-Time
description: The game takes place on a huge island separated into eight regions: Desert, Lagoon, Forest, Pyramids, Mountains, Factory, Village, and the Castle. When you manage to get through them, the last one awaits: The Machine which seems to be some sort of a way to get out of here. This level is not a typical stage after stage approach. Each screen has several exits that can either bring you closer to, or further from the end of the game.

name: Backrooms Exploration
description: Traverse your way through this Atmospheric Psychological Horror! Explore the 9 eerie levels of The Backrooms, a place where everything seems familiar, with a constant feeling of something or someone watching you. Why were you chosen to enter The Backrooms?

name: Pac-In-Time
description: The SNES version of Pac-In-Time, despite using the same basic gameplay mechanics, is an entirely new game using a different game engine and aesthetic.

name: Counter-Strike 2
description:
For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin. This is Counter-Strike 2.

A free upgrade to CS:GO, Counter-Strike 2 marks the largest technical leap in Counter-Strike’s history. Built on the Source 2 engine, Counter-Strike 2 is modernized with realistic physically-based rendering, state of the art networking, and upgraded Community Workshop tools.

name: Kouashi Kikou Shidan: Bein Panzer
description: Kouashi Kikou Shidan: Bein Panzer is a Strategy game, developed by Aprize Inc. and published by SCEI, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: IguaRPG
description: Be an iguana and save the world from evil.

name: Quiz Thiz Germany: Silver Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Super Kids Racing: Jungle Edition
description: Super Kids Racing : Jungle Edition offers wide variety of challenges with many different types of vehicles to choose from. Players will love to complete these challenges with their friends in split-screen multiplayer mode.

name: Castle of Deceit
description: Castle of Deceit is a first-person shooting battle game that takes place on an alien planet. You will play the leading role in finding the weak truth in the quagmire of lies and make your decision to find your lover.

name: The Territory of Egg
description: This is a variant tower defense indie game. Use the Egg Warriors to form a defense line, observe the type and distribution of the enemy, use the terrain structure, build a reasonable formation, explore different skill combinations, and protect the Holy Egg.

name: Exit: The Game - Trial of the Griffin
description: An exciting Escape Room experience awaits you! Can you uncover the secrets of Greifenstein Castle and escape?

name: Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training
description: Train your professional skills in Road Accident With Dangerous Goods VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

name: Atomic Blast
description: Atomic Blast is a tricky platformer with a plethora of dangers to keep your eye on. The protagonist may have a gun, but that won’t help much if he can’t dodge the enemy soldiers and death lasers that will cut him up with a single shot.

name: Koi de wa Naku: It's Not Love, but So where Near
description: This is the debut and the only title by Syangrila Smart. It tells the story from several perspectives but there are two main protagonists: Norifumi, a guy who has been taking pictures since he was small, and Yumi has been working as a model but suddenly shows interest in photography. Instead of a typical to a visual novel cast of heroines, this game rather follows a story told from both of their perspectives. Even though the title suggests that it isn’t about love, it tells a drama of adolescence describing a type of 'love' which is not quite romantic but close.

name: Kira Kira: Rock’n’Roll Show
description: Kira Kira: Rock’n’Roll Show is a port of Kira Kira for the PlayStation 2.

name: The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius: Jet Fusion
description: Game Boy Advance port of The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius: Jet Fusion.

name: Valley of Stars
description:
Nonogram puzzles with a mysterious story!

Will the girl and Mr Fox be able to get to the Valley of Stars safely?

What will await them at the end of the journey?

Watch their beautiful journey to the end while enjoying the nonogram puzzles.

name: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Sweet 16 - Licensed to Drive
description: Sin descripción

name: NASCAR Thunder 2003
description: PlayStation port of NASCAR Thunder 2003.

name: Tribefort
description: In this multiplayer survival and base-building game, you fight for survival on a vast island. Explore, mine, craft and gather resources to battle against other players for the strongest tribe.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants in Jellyfishin'
description: The first known video game to bear the SpongeBob SquarePants name, released sometime in early 1999 on the nick.com website. It's based off the "Jellyfishing" episode and has the spongy protagonist jump to catch jellyfish for a high score.

name: It Comes in Waves
description: A minimalist, experimental open-world adventure about guilt and grief. Explore, shoot, scavenge and bring a specimen to The Sanctuary.

name: Deal or No Deal: Das Interaktive DVD-Spiel
description: An interactive DVD game based on the Germen version of Deal or No Deal hosted by Guido Cantz.

name: Mario Kart DS N64 Circuit
description: A hack of Mario Kart DS which adds in Mario Kart 64 tracks into the game

name: Snowball Christmas Festival
description: Snowball Christmas festival is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Horny Hotel Maids
description: Horny Hotel Maids is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Formula GP
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Harry Potter: The Battle for Hogwarts
description: LEGO Harry Potter: The Battle for Hogwarts is an online 2D platformer based on the LEGO Harry Potter sets.

name: Inize Warrior
description: The "Beat it, then break it" pixel art RPG featuring two storylines and a unique battle system with platforming elements.

name: GunFu Deadlands
description: GunFu Deadlands is a super hard retro styled indie game. You play a wild west guy, and have to kill all the bad guys on each of 10 levels.

name: Chibi Ninja Shino-kun: Treasure of Demon Tower
description: Inspired by Japanese ninja games from the 80s and 90s, Chibi Ninja Shino-kun: Treasure of Demon Tower is a fast and smooth retro platformer in which you climb a giant tower while dodging enemies, traps and other obstacles. Use your wall jump, hookshot and ceiling running abilities to make it past the various enemies and discover the legendary treasure of Demon Tower!

name: Jetpack Basketball
description: Jetpack Basketball is a combination made in heaven: fast-paced hoop action played with jetpacks. A single player can take on an AI-controlled opponent, or two players can go head-to-head locally for some slam-dunking action.

name: CubeRun 2
description: You are a cube. Fight with other enemy cubes in a procedurally generated map. Earn rewards and customize yourself and your surroundings in this action shooter with a top view

name: Causeway
description: Create intricate and satisfying road systems in tiny utopian cities Causeway is a minimalist road building sim where you help futuristic hover vehicles find their destinations by building roadways to connect different highways. Get ready to build the roadways of the future!

name: Hitstun
description: Hitstun is a turn based fighting game with online matchmaking. Challenge your friends to an exciting battle with diverse characters and movesets.

name: The Riddler
description: Think you're clever? Prove it with an enigmatic AI, the ultimate master of riddles beyond imagination.

name: Superfidos
description: Help Kenny, Lenny, and Max save humanity in this adventure about courage and loyalty. Explore 8 interconnected worlds, fighting epic bosses, searching for upgrades, and powerful magic spells in this platforming game designed for the whole family.

name: XeeWar
description:
XeeWar is an online 2-player turn-based strategy war game where players fight for control over the battlefield by destroying enemy units and capturing bases.
Each player take turns building units, advancing on the battlefield, capturing bases and eventually engaging in combat. Each combat unit has its own strengths and weaknesses, and are affected by the terrain. Use advanced tactics to outsmart your opponent!
XeeWar uses the Elo-rating system (often used in Chess). Your rating changes after each match, based on your opponents rating. Gain enough rating and you will start gaining Ranks and climb the leaderboard!
When you start playing XeeWar you have the rank 'Recruit'. If your rating gets high enough you will recieve a new rank. There are 7 ranks total, with 'General' as the highest rank.
Good luck on the battlefield commander!

name: Where Is My Crown?
description:
The kingdom host the biggest party of the year to celebrate the king inauguration. But, the king had too many honey and lost his crown....
Where is my crown? is a new procedurally generated deduction game and you can play it anywhere only needing your smart logic and thinking.
Where is my crown? is a deduction game where players must explore and investigate other character to find the crown.

name: Let's Go Run
description:
Be willing to end the 30 missions and you wander in a popular Suq?
And the removal of restrictions on your friends in the game to be able to play their own.

name: Swim Meet
description: See if you can beat the best in 5 Olympic-style Swimming Events. Use finger gestures that are modeled on the actual swimming motion used in each event.

name: Man Overboard!
description: In 60 levels you have to rescue as many passengers (dubbed the Dim Passengers) as possible. At the beginning the passengers fall through a tube in the level. Similar to Lemmings you have to find a way for the passengers to the exit of the level. In order to do so, you must blast hindrances such as cargo boxes and bulkheads with bombs or, when no bombs are left, reposition the boxes with a crane. There are also conveyor belts in the levels. If the belt moves in the wrong way, the passengers either can't use it or may even be transported to their dooms, being dropped off into water, fire or steam jets. You can usually choose the direction of the belts by pulling a lever.

name: Recess Riot
description:
From the creators of the cult hit game Super Mega Worm, comes a new and fresh arcade game.
Recess Riot is an unique and challenging Action/Arcade game comprised of multiple game modes.
Jump! mode is a timing based jump rope game with a twist. Ropers will change rope speed and patterns. Ropers will also shift left and right to keep the players on their toes. Advance stages will require players to jump rope and dodge incoming objects simultaneously.

name: Oran's Table
description:
Oran challenges you to take a seat at his table in this thoughtful puzzler.
Use the unique movements of each piece to cover every portal. You'll need to step, slide, jump, swap, shift, mimic and connect your way to the solution.
You must think creatively: pieces working in harmony create paths greater than the sum of their parts.
Controls are simple. Tap to reveal range, and tap again to move.
Features over 120 handmade puzzles, 6 unique pieces, and a few surprises which only the most devoted players will discover.
Play the 1st 16 puzzles free, and pay only once to play the rest.

name: Neon Sling
description: Drag the large neon ball on the sling line and release it to shoot the targets!

name: Putt Golf
description: Play the ultimate fun Putt Golf game. The game is very simple, you just have to judge the angle of the ground and tap at the right time to putt the ball.

name: King of Sopio
description: The Sopio family increases with King Of Sopio!

name: 4 In a Blow
description: 4 In a Blow is the classic 4 in a row made for casual and puzzle gamers. Unlock items that can help you make 4 in a row. Use dynamite, buy extra bombs, use the torch and air canister. Do everything to make 4 in a row.

name: American Football: Guns & Balls
description: Sin descripción

name: MLB Tap Baseball 2023
description: MLB Baseball comes to your phone with the MLB Tap Baseball mobile game. Manage a dream team of real MLB players from the most current rosters and travel to authentic ball parks. Play nine innings of gripping baseball action and power up your team to help your club rank at the top of the leaderboard! Tap to swing and hit a home run with simple controls - but keep your eye on the ball!

name: Blades Away
description:
Physics based, 2D blade throwing simulation game with lots of unique blades to collect and master.
Knife throwing has never been this easy to pick up and this challenging to fully master. Throw axes, knives, swords, ninja stars and other blades from all across the world. Huge rewards for skill and perception.

name: Ball til You Fall
description:
Ball til You Fall is a lighthearted basketball shooter with attitude.
Swipe the ball at the hoop to score, but beware! Missed shots come with a penalty. If you hit the backboard, you risk pushing the hoop off of the edge!
Collect gems to win new balls with mysterious new abilities that can give you that competitive edge.

name: Burning Tracks
description:
Get airborne, flip over, climb mountains, drift and more in this realistic 3D off road racing game.
With many different terrains and maps, face off with other off road racers and try to beat them to the finish line.
Turn with a tilt of your device, floor the gas with a touch of a finger, drift by touching the handbrake and touch the brake to slow down.

name: Tales of the Rays: Fairy's Requiem
description:
Fairy's Requiem adds the third story scenario to Tales of the Rays and was released ahead of the games second anniversary event. Victor from Tales of Xillia 2 appears in the first chapter and was added to the game becoming the 100th playable character.

The main character is switched back to Ix, with a new outfit for this scenario, with Kocis no longer available in the party. Kocis remains playable in content set in the second scenario.

This update added the first chapter of the new scenario, available for new players after completing the prologue, and included updates to the game's tutorial along with changes to scenario 1 chapters 2 to 5.
Rays Chronicle, a section for the story's timeline, was also added to the game.

name: Nightmares Before Disney
description: In a land where all your dreams come true, does the same apply to nightmares?

name: The Underside
description:
The Underside is an exploration based action platformer in the vein of games like Castlevania, Metroid, and Cave Story.

The game is seemingly not complete with the last major update occurring in 2009.

name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter: 2005 Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Bobble for Kakao
description: Bubble Bobble for Kakao is a mobile game released exclusively in Japan and Korea in 2014. The game requires a Kakao account to play and adds various social network features to the game. The game's service ended on March 15, 2019.

name: Skullpogo
description:
The hordes of Undead are invading!

Zombies, bloodthirsty bats, and... vampire PIGS? It's time to deal with these vile cretins using your secret weapon: a POGO stick!

name: Asphalt 9 Legends Arcade
description: Tear up the asphalt and take on the world’s top drivers to become the next racing legend in the most thrilling arcade racing simulator available. Asphalt 9 Legends Arcade puts you behind the wheel of high-end supercars from the world’s most renowned car brands and manufacturers, such as Porsche, Lamborghini, W Motors, and many more. Drive, boost and perform stunts across dynamic real-life locations in single or multiplayer modes as you compete on global leaderboards, and work your way to collecting all 20 racing machines. With heart-pumping action and jaw-dropping graphics, no other racing game can compete.

name: To Heart 2: Another Days
description: To Heart 2: Another Days is a spin-off from To Heart 2, taking place sometime after the events of the original game, its main storyline allows the player to pursue seven heroines consisting of both supporting female characters from To Heart 2 and new characters. In addition, it also contains two additional scenarios that extend storylines from the original game.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Thornweaver Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket Control
description: This game is an extremely simple 2D action game where you launch, control, and land rockets. The rules are simple: ascend to an altitude of 1000 meters, start the descent, and then land back at the original launchpad.

name: Project Liminal Redux
description: Project Liminal Redux is a first-person horror made in realistic 3D graphics. The gameplay consists of collecting notes, solving riddles and escaping from various entities. The main goal is to survive and escape.

name: New Super Abandoned: Discovery Island
description: New Super A:DI VI.0 DX: Director's Cut DELUXE: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Found 2021 Revision 3 feat. Dante from the Devil May Cry series Final Mix Redux with New Funky Mode - A Fragmentary Passage and Knuckles Remastered (otherwise simply known as New Super Abandoned: Discovery Island) is a semi-serious self-parodying April Fools' update to Abandoned: Discovery Island. Taking place in a separate continuity, the game features a mixture of improvements and additions, as well as joke additions and changes. This version is planned to receive updates as well as the DLC feature that were intended to be added to R1 and the original game, though it is not planned to entirely replace it at the moment nor will it be the game's last iteration.

name: Goat!Goat!
description: Goat!Goat! is a casual puzzle game where you need to remove blocks by matching 3 in a row! Sounds easy? Not so fast! You never know how deep the puzzle goes, or what lies underneath!

name: The Penguin Game: Antarctic Savior
description: Collect air conditioners, save Antarctica! Only you can save penguins. Antarctic savior! This is an open world adventure game with various contents such as sports mini-games, FPS, boss battles, item farming, quests, platformers, and puzzles.

name: Ultimate Ball
description: Completely simulate the physical laws of the real world, by building different structures, let the ball as fast as possible to the end! Try as many solutions as you can, and see who can get to the finish line in less time than your friends!

name: Do You See Sparky?
description: Do You See Sparky? is a first-person co-op horror game for 1-4 players with a social deduction elements. Collect clues, solve puzzles, cheat to catch a monster that you can't see, but your friends can.

name: Souseishi, Arui wa Doukoku no Mokushiroku: Incarnation Erased from History
description: Touhou-style independent shooting game featuring original characters and world.

name: Brain Hole Girls
description: Can a perfect body and a smart brain coexist?

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator - Al Forno Pack
description: Make delicious wood-fired pizzas and give your restaurant an Italian ambiance with the Al Forno pack. Get 8 pizza recipes and a wide range of customization items to decorate your restaurant.

name: The House of E.
description: The House of E. is a story-driven puzzle game with horror elements and a creepy atmosphere.

name: Dungeon Legend
description: This is a casual breakout game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

name: Ballsvoid
description: Difficult game of skill and reflexes where you have to help the character to escape. Take your controller and prepare to die many times.

name: LEGO 2K Drive
description:
Welcome to Bricklandia, home of a massive open-world LEGO driving adventure. Race anywhere, play with anyone, build your dream rides, and defeat a cast of wild racing rivals for the coveted Sky Trophy!

In LEGO 2K Drive, your awesome transforming vehicle gives you the freedom to speed seamlessly across riveting racetracks, off-road terrain, and open waters. Explore the vast world of Bricklandia, show off your driving skills, and build vehicles brick-by-brick!

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Awesome Edition
description:
LEGO 2K Drive Awesome Edition includes:

# Aquadirt Racer Pack
# Year 1 Drive Pass: Includes Season 1, 2, 3 and 4 DLC packs. the Awesome Pizza Vehicle. Release timing of the DLC contents will be revealed at a future date.
# 550 Coins
# Awesome Bonus Pack: Includes Wheelie Stunt Driver Minifigure, Machio Beast Vehicle and a Vehicle Flair.
# 3 Day Early Access

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Awesome Rivals Edition
description:
LEGO 2K Drive Awesome Rivals Edition includes:

# Aquadirt Racer Pack
# Year 1 Drive Pass: Includes Season 1, 2, 3 and 4 DLC packs. the Awesome Pizza Vehicle. Release timing of the DLC contents will be revealed at a future date.
# Awesome Bonus Pack: Includes Wheelie Stunt Driver Minifigure, Machio Beast Vehicle and a Vehicle Flair.
# 550 Coins
# 3 Day Early Access
# Awesome Rivals Bonus Pack: Includes Royal Sailor, Royal Outtaliner, Royal People Rover Street Car, Reckless Scorpion Stunt Driver Minifigure, Hamburghini Royale and Vehicle Flair.

name: Unforgiven: Carry The Pain
description: Broken... Shattered... On a journey to redemption... Carrying the pain of his past errors... Seeking forgiveness by accepting a quest bestowed upon him by the King to cleanse the Underworld from an ancient evil... also giving him a chance for revenge from the one causing the pain in the first place...

name: Absence Makes...
description: A short interactive poem about life & longing whilst working from home.

name: Adibou d'chou soigne les animaux
description: Educational game for pre-schoolers set in a Zoo.

name: Adibou d'chou: Jardin des surprises
description: Educational game for pre-schoolers set in a magical garden.

name: Arrows Left
description: Sin descripción

name: Adibou Anglais
description: Educational game for teaching young children English as a second language.

name: Chef Boyardee Can Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Bitsy
description: Bitsy is a 3D stealth puzzle game where you play as a mechanized spider completing contracts in a futuristic world. Climb walls, leap and web sling around tough obstacles, and above all: avoid detection.

name: Childhood Dreams: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Childhood Dreams: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Dinosaurily
description: Sin descripción

name: Legendary Realms: A Fantasy World Odyssey
description: Legendary Realms: A Fantasy World Odyssey is a multiplayer sandbox adventure game. Create your own character, select classes, and take on quests to earn rewards and level up. With a range of equipment and multiplayer options, it's an immersive experience that will keep you engaged for hours.

name: Wastelan Wars
description: You come out of the Vault, build a magnificent city.

name: Tomomon: Legacy of Light
description: Experience the best of both worlds with our monster taming game - relive the nostalgia of classic role-play games, while enjoying fresh and immersive gameplay. Capture and train unique monsters in stunning environments, and put your skills to the test in challenging 3v3 battles.

name: Solasta: Crown of the Magister - Palace of Ice
description: Although the heroes of Caer Cyflen managed to prevent the Soraks' attempt at reopening the Rift to unleash their foul god upon Solasta, the threat is far from over. Kingdom of Gallivan has suddenly declared war on their neighbours, and the Snow Alliance is calling for your help!

name: Kay's Destiny
description:
A retro style indie JRPG with pixel art graphics and a live piano soundtrack.
Created by youtuber "KayThePianist".

name: Blitzkrieg: Toubu Sensen 1941-45
description: World War II strategy game, based upon the Operation Barbarossa.

name: Shota Kare!
description: Shota Kare! is a visual novel game.

name: Daisenryaku III '90
description: Daisenryaku III '90 is a turn-based war strategy game.

name: Okuman Chouja II
description: Stock and investment simulator game.

name: DeepOne
description: Naoya and his twin sister Konoka had lost their parents at a young age and had a tough childhood. Nevertheless they still managed to find happiness in the little things in life and wished that these warm peaceful days would last forever. However, this faint hope was mercilessly crushed when a Grimoire suddenly appeared before them. It is a forbidden magic book that has existed since the beginning of time, but which should not be in the human realm. They thought that they were an ordinary family, but they were actually the heirs to the “Old One”, which has the power to destabilize the world.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Desert Operation
description: Sin descripción

name: Eightrun
description: Eightrun is an intense, minimalist game of fast reflexes, in which the player tries to dodge patterns of obstacles while moving down an endless, octagonal tunnel.

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Feathered Species Pack
description: Expand your Jurassic World with the incredible Jurassic World Evolution 2: Feathered Species Pack. Featuring three land-dwelling dinosaurs and one flying reptile, these eye-catching feathered species will help you evolve your park like never before.

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals - Scenario "Prisoners of the Battles"
description: Wizardry: Prisoners of the Battles is a DLC scenario for The Five Ordeals in which the adventurers face relentless challenges in their attempt to aid the local royal guard.

name: Romantic Shooter
description: Romantic Shooter is an erotic shmup game where you'll be able to destroy the girls clothes!

name: Adibou: Je lis, je calcule 4-5 ans
description: An educational game focused on reading and math for 4-5 year old children.

name: Adibou: Je lis, je calcule 5-6 ans
description: An educational game focused on reading and math for 5-6 year old children.

name: Adibou: Je lis, je calcule 6-7 ans
description: An educational game focused on reading and math for 6-7 year old children.

name: Adibou: Aventure dans le corps humain
description: An educational game about human anatomy aimed at children ages 4-8.

name: Adibou Nature et Sciences
description: An educational game about Nature and Science targeted at children ages 4-8.

name: Adibou d'chou au Pays des Bonbons
description: An educational game for children ages 2-5 set in a land of candy.

name: Evocation: Oltre il Sogno
description: Evocation: Oltre il sogno is the third instalment of the Evocation series. It is a first-person adventure with philosophical themes where the player navigates pre-rendered environments to solve puzzles.

name: Adibou d'chou au cirque
description: An educational game for 2-5 year olds set in a circus.

name: Adibou d'chou fête son anniversaire
description: An educational game for 2-5 year old children set at a birthday party.

name: Mudborne
description: Mudborne is a casual nature management sim about discovering & breeding frogs! Awoken from hibernation you find your pond abandoned. Through the genetic keys of new species you must unlock the paths between the waking & dreaming worlds, and embark on a journey to restore lost populations.

name: Dango Thief
description: Kazuki awakes one morning to find that he no longer exists. Play a game of hide n' seek in this psychological horror RPG game in order to reclaim his existence. You only have 7 days to win. Explore the town by day, survive fatal nightmares by night, and discover the mysteries of the Dreamscape.

name: Some Spring Days
description: This game is a visual novel game about some spring days when a sensitive girl meets a upperclassman and loses herself in thought. Play time is very short, about 10 minutes. About 20 stills.

name: Shuttle World
description: Shuttle World is a third person simulation business game. I believe that most people are struggling to achieve financial freedom and strive to become the boss of the richest party; When the penniless you come to a strange city, please use your wisdom, arrange your time reasonably, and strive to live

name: Anima Reprise
description: It has been one hundred years. One hundred years since you were captured and a plot (or rather a sickly joke) to take over the universe and overthrow the king was enacted. Now the world is run by literal clowns, and you must overthrow the overthrowee, and take back the honor of the king.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Endless Summer Splash! Costume Set
description: Swimsuits for Ryza and her friends! Adds 11 swimsuits, one for each party member.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Summer Look Costume Set
description: Summer outfits for Atelier Ryza 3! Adds 7 summer costumes, one each for Ryza, Klaudia, Lent, Tao, Empel, Lila, and Bos.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Keicho Nijimura
description: Command your own army with Keicho Nijimura's stand Worse Company, now available in All-Star Battle R! Mobilize Keicho's troops, tanks, and helicopters to blow your opponents away!

name: Daemon Masquerade
description: An anime-inspired supernatural detective game. Uncover the identities and powers of your adversaries using a conspiracy board full of evidence.

name: ClickeRogue
description: Slay enemies using clicks, spells and get stronger by leveling up in endless dungeons !

name: Infected
description: First Person Survival

name: Quiz Thiz Germany: Bronze Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Celebrity Slot Machine
description: Celebrity Slot Machine is a single player quick-play game that is fun for all the family - keeping Vegas-style slots in a fun and safe way for all.

name: Lucky Slots
description: Lucky Slot is a single player quick-play game that is fun for all the family - keeping Vegas-style slots in a fun and safe way for all.

name: Tasty Slot Machine
description:
You start with 1,000 coins - the aim of the game is to wager your coins to try and increase your coins as high as you can. Pick the number of pay lines and then how much the bet per line will be. Then cross your fingers and press spin.
If you win on a spin, you can either Take Win or choose to Double of Nothing in a simple game of Red or Black. Keep playing until you run out of coins or want to Cash Out and register your rank in the Leaderboards!

name: Arcade Archives: Bonze Adventure
description: Bring your buddhist beads on this journey to hell and back!

name: Learn the Letters
description: Sin descripción

name: Quiz Thiz Germany: Gold Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: The Lions Knight
description: The Lions Knight is a game designed to the players who love SRPG game. A large number of 3D heroes and monsters! The battle is tactfully and simple operation; And the other leisure playing - farm and mining. we provide a strategy and relaxed game experience for player experience.

name: The Light Box
description: This challenging and unique puzzle game is easy to pick up but has hours of gameplay.

name: Shadow Land
description:
One day, the world suddenly lost its colour…
All the colour in the world was taken by a monster that came from nowhere!
The colourful world became monochromatic…
In these times, we need the help of the legendary puppeteer!

name: My Brother is a Superhero
description: Luke is a comic-mad eleven-year-old who shares a treehouse with his geeky older brother, Zach. Luke's only mistake is to need a wee right at the wrong moment. While he's gone an alien gives his undeserving, never-read-a-comic-in-his-life brother superpowers, then tells him to save the universe. Luke is massively annoyed about this, but when Zach is kidnapped by his arch-nemesis, Luke and his friends only have five days to find him and save the world...

name: Mini Tennis
description: Pick your racket and choose your ball. Get ready to go onto the court in this brand-new tennis game! Experience tennis like never before in this fresh and easy-to-play game. In Mini Tennis, you can enjoy a casual gameplay experience that still remains loyal to the original game. It’s time for you to get a standing ovation from the crowd in the arenas and courts, score some amazing points, and build the strongest tennis legend that ever existed!

name: Mimpi Hidden Objects
description:
Meet Mimpi, the cutest puppy ever! Help him find hidden objects in a colorful world - in the craziest dream a dog can ever have!
Travel through seven diverse lands that Mimpi visited on his original quest to find his master.

name: Ark Bubble
description: Ark Bubble is similar to brick breaker genre with some cool adaptations. Instead of moving a paddle, you draw lines on the screen to avoid the ball to scape in the bottom of screen. You can not draw infinite number of lines, they are limited but you can buy more ones with your points.

name: Archery Tournament
description: Discover this top free archery game with tournament mode, great performance, small install size, and amazing features!

name: Cave Swing
description:
Falling into a cave is never fun, but things quickly change when you discover that the cave is full of diamonds!
Swing from side to side and collect as many diamonds as possible. Unlock awesome characters with unique abilities, but whatever you do, do not hit the cave walls.

name: Jungle Jammy
description:
Swing endlessly through the jungle and throw bananas at eagles and sleepy snakes. Bananas are great for survival and your health.
Go bananas!

name: Jumpy Rooftop
description:
Running, jumping, and sprinting is what Jumpy Rooftop is all about!
Unlock all 32 or more hero characters, including a fireman, policeman, gym junkie, robber and more! Collect heroes during endless mode and earn bonus gems just for playing!
You can run through night and day, good and bad weather, rain hail or snow! Chickens, fireworks, water spouts and all sorts of crazy stuff will cross your road. Dodge missiles and other nasty stuff falling from the sky! If it's not a bird, it'll probably kill you!

name: CoogyLoop
description: Easy rules, easy to use, easy to get addicted to. Coogyloop is all about making sure your mind is quick and your fingers quicker.

name: CoupButat
description:
Enjoy the story of little pigs and wolves, which you've probably never seen!
The Fairy Tale of little pigs and wolf... is familiar to everybody in the world.
But this game's story seems a little different to the story we all know...
Complete the game, and look forward for the original ending!

name: Deadly Soccer
description:
Dear players, we draw your attention to the unique opportunity to see an abundance of various evil spirits in a soccer game.
In the heat of the lost souls' tournament, the accumulation of a large amount of immortal substance created to something which installed itself into the soccer ball, so that everything it touched started coming to life – from the lifeless bodies in the cemetery to the scarecrows in the gardens... All the revived ones demonstrated an unquenchable thirst for the game.

name: Hidden Object: Mystery of Mysteries of the Aztecs
description: Everyone wants to take part in an interesting adventure in search of ancient civilizations. Do not miss your chance, not everyone has in life! You'll have to show attentiveness, speed of thinking to solve the difficult but very interesting problems. And only after that you can see the beauty of the ancient world, which has hidden waiting for many centuries! Do not waste your time and forward - to new adventures!

name: Yello Adventures
description: Overcome challenging and dangerous platforms with a variety of different and challenging enemies and make sure you are prepared for the boss at the end of the level where you will show your experience and expertise! Spend the money you get from enemies in the in-game store, upgrade your weapon and become more effective in your fight against your enemies!

name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Parade Pack
description:
Keep the streets of New York safe with these prestigious suits and weapon skins. This bundle includes:

- Police Parade Set
- FNYC Parade Set
- Gemstone Amethyst Weapon Skin
- Glitch Barrium Weapon Skin
- Safari Monteverde Weapon Skin

name: Computer Othello
description: An arcade video game released in 1978 exclusively in Japan. It was the first video game both published and developed by Nintendo, and the first game developed by Nintendo R&D1. The game was a computerized version of the board game Othello (also known as Reversi). The game allowed for one person to play Othello against a computer opponent. It was also possible for two people to play head to head.

name: Excavatorrr
description: Dig as deep as you can and get all the gold

name: Beacon
description:
Winner of the Ludum Dare 15 competition, Beacon was developed in less
than two days and follows the story of a child who is lost in the darkness. A
beacon of light appears out of nowhere, and the child must follow the light
closely or else be sucked into the blackness.

name: Focus
description:
Focus is a platformer with a teleporting twist. The main character escapes
from a cage and soon finds a glowing gem that gives him the power to move
quickly through space and even pass through solid objects.

name: Saut
description: Saut is a one button platformer with unique movements made for the Minimal Contest. It's about a small guy unable to walk that instead jump and slide!

name: Detective Solitaire: Butler Story 2
description: A detective world and solitaire! Explore the locations of an ancient mansion.

name: Ocean Punk
description: A pixel ocean survival game. Ocean current disasters have submerged the land and devastated the planet. As survivors, you need to build survival bases and pick up things to help you handle all situations, like the changing climate and the invasion of enemies.

name: Violations Will Be Punished
description: An old-school turn-based strategy game with a philosophical story set in the dystopian 23rd century Solar System. You start as a cog in a corporation, search for meaning, and eventually become the mastermind of humanity.

name: Sky Symphony
description: Welcome to Sky Symphony, the ultimate side-scrolling flying adventure! Take flight in a stunning, immersive world filled with endless obstacles, challenges, and opportunities to collect points.

name: Super Cute Alien's Adventure
description: A cute platforming adventure for players of all ages!

name: Squares and Numbers
description: A beginner friendly abstract nonogram puzzle game.

name: The Ripper: Serial Killers
description: Remember that voice in your head telling you to do the wrong thing? That voice is you. Guide the protagonist and whisper in his ear whether to spare the lives of the citizens or murder them

name: Figment 1 + Figment 2
description: Figment is an action-adventure set in the recesses of the human mind... Welcome to the world of Figment. A strange and surreal world; a place filled with our deepest thoughts, urges and memories, populated by the many voices we hear in our heads.

name: Magic World: Unravel the Magic
description: A magical world where you can choose between 4 different characters, will you be a good apprentice magician or will you sow chaos in the school of magic and sorcery?

name: Air Hockey Arcade: Casual Board Game
description: Classic arcade sport board game where you can challenge both AI and your friends!

name: Crime Busters: Strike Area
description: A single-player top down game that fights against terrorists around the world! Do a battle and play with each other for up to maximum 2 people!

name: Word War Vi
description: Word War vi is your basic side-scrolling shoot 'em up '80s style arcade game. You pilot your "vi"per craft through core memory, rescuing lost .swp files, avoiding OS defenses, and wiping out those memory hogging emacs processes. When all the lost .swp files are rescued, head for the socket which will take you to the next node in the cluster.

name: Epic Boss Fighter
description: Earth is under threat by 10 of the most epic bosses known to mankind. And only one can stop them....his name is Blast! Help Blast upgrades his weaponry, buy force field and upgrade his character. Be ready to defend earth against these monsters and bring peace back to our world!

name: Fobia ...Worse Than Fear.
description: An adventure of exploration, intrigue and psychological terror of great originality.

name: Four-Knight
description: Four-Knight is a simple four-in-a-row. Act strategically on the simple rules and aim for your victory.

name: Wretched Depths
description: Play as Sam and fish to your hearts content, sell fish you've caught, collect better gear, and use it to explore the depths of the mysterious lake, but be warned as no one knows what lies at the bottom. Wretched Depths is a PSX-style horror fishing game created by students at the University of Utah.

name: Brawlhalla: All Legends
description: Come fight for glory in Brawlhalla – an epic free-to-play platform fighting game. Join casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or make a custom room with your friends. Millions of players, frequent updates, and more than 50 unique characters.

name: Sludge Life 2
description: Big Mud is missing! Everyone's favourite rapping frog has vanished, and his closest homie Ghost (that's you) is on a mission to find him. Sludge Life 2 whisks you away to Ciggy City Suites, a luxurious multi-floor hotel heaving with secrets, gadgets, gags, peculiar characters, and ugly corporate architecture to make over with your spray can.

name: Contraptions 2
description: Use camels as trampolines, champagne bottles as cannons, balloons to lift objects, fireworks wheels to drive conveyor belts, magnets to attract metal objects, and many more gadgets to solve the puzzles and clear the levels.

name: IGDB
description: A co-operative MMORPG where you work with the most incredible people to provide a layer of stability to an industry that does its best break any taxonomy. You play as one of several classes (Data, Engineering, Leadership). Each with its own area of ownership, and dependancies. Alone it is impossible to add value, but by co-operating across the various classes you are able to thwart tight deadlines, aging tech stacks, and troll submissions and in the end form meaningful friendships.

name: Binarion
description: Improve your intellect with this unique puzzle game where you solve delta grid to find two binary prime factors from a given multiplication product.

name: Nix: Ashes of the Phoenix
description: Ashes of the Phoenix is a survivor style, Roguelite ARPG experience set in a dark high fantasy world. The story follows Nix, a mysterious heroine (or is she?), as she battles her way through hordes of enemies to uncover the mystery that is the world around her.

name: PhaigeX: Hyperspace Survivors
description: PhaigeX is a fast-paced "survivor-style" space shooter that tasks the player to contain a growing incursion of rogue AI-controlled units. Pilot a variety of ships, use a myriad of upgrades and lay down heavy firepower against the growing menace.

name: Jump Jump Cyberpunk
description: A strategy game where driving a ball you will have to overcome countless obstacles to reach the exit and move to the next level. You will find led levels full of jumps, free falls, spins,teleports, obstacles and music that will immerse you in the game. A perfect combination to enjoy, are you ready?

name: Darksy's Adventure
description: Darksy's Adventure is a 3D platformer with furry characters and abstract 3D worlds. Tail whip and pounce your way to victory!

name: Core-Blast
description: Find core of the same type that are close to each other and click on them to blast.

name: Not for Broadcast: Deluxe Edition
description: The award-winning Not For Broadcast, now including the DLC Season Pass.

name: Super Magbot: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Before We Leave: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Raptor Rush
description: The game features a dynamic day and night system that adds a new level of challenge and excitement to the game. You'll be able to see the stunning visuals change as you progress through each level, keeping you engaged and immersed in the game.

name: FNAF in Psych Engine
description: FNAF 1, but remade in Friday Night Funkin' Psych Engine LUA

name: Abandoned: Discovery Island - Jeff The Killer
description: Abandoned: Discovery Island - Jeff The Killer is a Minigame version of Abandoned: Discovery Island, created by Photo Negative Mickey. Minigame later ported to Abandoned: Discovery Island in the next update.

name: Friday Night Funkin: vs. Jeff
description: Sin descripción

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Commonwealth Forces
description: CMBN Commonwealth Forces Module is an add-on Module for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy that brings British, Canadian, and Polish Allied forces to fight in France.

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Vehicle Pack
description: Vehicle Pack for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy brings some interesting oddball vehicles to the Western Front environment. From the rather obscure Halftrack U304(f) repurposed French halftrack to the more famous Churchill Crocodile there's plenty of fun in this Pack.

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Battle Pack 1
description: Battle Pack 1 for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy expands the experience of the Western Front by covering the period of combat between Normandy and Operation Market Garden. Designed by veteran CM scenario designer Jon Sowden.

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Market Garden
description: CMBN Market Garden Module is an add-on Module for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy that portrays the famous battles for the bridges over the Rhine.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Multiplayer Mode
description:
Join forces with your friend in the ultimate cooking adventure with this new Multiplayer Mode!

This DLC features an exciting local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
description:
Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations. Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels. Personalize your interior with countless upgrades.

All of us have a magic place, where everyday troubles seem to disappear. Sweet Bakery Tycoon fulfills your fantasy of creating and managing a bakery of your dreams

name: Choo Choo Survivor
description: Drive your train and get to safety while shooting down endless hordes of zombies that are blocking your way. Upgrade your weapons and abilities and become absurdly powerful!

name: Wars Across the World: Zulu 1879
description: Zulu 1879 recreates the British military campaign leading up to the destruction of the belligerent Zulu kingdom in South Africa in 1879. The British and their allies must quickly seize the enemy capital Ulundi or capture the Zulu king.

name: Hentai Ariel
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Urban Flow: Prime Edition
description: This bundle includes base game and Streets Supplement with 5 new vehicles to the streets of Urban Flow, each one unique and with its own style.

name: Boreal Tenebrae Deluxe
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Tales of the Rays: Last Cradle
description:
This update added the first chapter of Last Cradle, the fourth story scenario for Tales of the Rays, and reworked the weapon system for the game.

The new system merged all weapons for a character into one menu allowing for easier changes and created an equipment level based on the amount of different weapons owned. The previous system for weapon levels was converted into a higher starting level for existing players while the max level is decided by the number of weapons owned, their rarity and their upgrad rank ,

Weapons are now auto-upgraded, or sold when already maxed, as duplicates are acquired and the inventory storage space used for them was removed from the game, refunds were given to players for the resources used to expand it.

name: Tofu'Drift
description:
In this challenging arcade driving game, you have to collect all the red cubes with your car. Sounds easy enough, right? But you only have 10 seconds to complete each level.
Can you manage all 15 levels?

name: Tales of the Rays: Recollection
description:
Recollection is the next major update for Tales of the Rays and was shown on the games 6th anniversary broadcast.

With the main story of the game completed at the end of the 4th scenario, Last Cradle, this update for the game will introduce a new story with 6 new characters.
So far a new system, Successive Stories, involving older titles from the franchise has been shown and a combat system overhaul was also revealed.

Another stream is planned for March 30th with more information about the update.

name: The Day
description:
It's Tia's birthday, and she's looking forward to beating all of her friends with the new card her dad gave her! Beat the other kids by choosing the right cards, and earn more cards until you're the best of them all!

And don't go into the woods, or the guards will kill you.

This is a Flash game from Gregory Avery-Weir, released in 2010 and now available as a downloadable projector for the first time.

name: Toko Toko Trouble
description: Sin descripción

name: RedCat 2: De Ontvoering van Prinses Dana
description: In RedCat 2, the mouse gang led by the dangerous wizard Kyrion has kidnapped Princess Dana. RedCat's task is to free the princess. For this he has to fight through all kinds of paths, fields and forests in the land of Kyrion.

name: RedCat: De Europese Stedentocht
description: RedCat searches Europe for pieces of a crashed UFO.

name: RedCat: De Reusachtige Letterraket
description: A game to expand vocabulary in a playful way.

name: RedCat: De Duistere Dierendiefstal
description: RedCat travels in a UFO along the five continents and looks for all kinds of mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians and fish.

name: RedCat Megapack
description: Four exciting and educational adventures of RedCat and his opponents Brutus the Bulldog and Max the Mouse

name: RedCat Megapack 2
description: Four exciting and educational adventures of Redcat and his opponents Brutus the Bulldog and Max the Mouse

name: RedCat Megapack 3
description: Three fun and educational CD-ROMs and a music CD in a box

name: Battery Check
description:
Battery Check is an action game with strategic elements. So it comes down to dexterity, but you will have to think regularly. It's all about batteries and the mechanisms they power. When those batteries are empty, everything comes to a standstill, and you can't get any further. So you have to make sure you keep things running...

Battery Check was given away for free by Stibat when returning 15 empty batteries between May 9 and June 20, 1998. The goal was to give away 50,000 units, but due to its popularity, it ended up being 220,000.

name: A Case for Cap & Co
description:
Karen Lucre is in a fix! Zak, her little dog has been kidnapped!

The kidnappers are asking for a huge ransom. Zak is in a great danger. Time is running out and Karen's parents are on holiday... it's obviously A Case for Cap and Co! Together with Cap, Billy, Karen and Toby you must comb the town of Roseborough for clues. Who are the kidnappers? Where is poor Zak being held? Can you help free him in time?

name: Een Wonderlijk Avontuur met Pardoes de Tovernar
description: A Wonderful Adventure with Pardoes the Tovernar is a computer game on CD-ROM in which Pardoes has to defeat Pantagor through a journey through the Efteling. It was published in 2000 by ReDi Entertainment B.V.

name: Spelen met Bassie & Adriaan Deel 1
description: Playing with Bassie & Adriaan Part 1 contains the Crooks game, karaoke, a memory game and (digital) coloring pages.

name: Spelen met Bassie & Adriaan Deel 2
description: Playing with Bassie & Adriaan Part 2 contains (digital) jigsaw puzzles, a music game, a memory game and an exciting catch game.

name: We Want You
description: We Want You is a procedural war platformer with a satirical flavor. Try and fight your way through enemy territory back to your allied camp.

name: Being Struck By Lightning is Probably the Best Way That You Could Die On Account of All of Its Awesomeness
description: The game is tricky, with tough jumps to make and numerous dangerous spike pits.

name: Maratoma do Faustão
description: Maratoma do Faustão was a full-motion web browser game based on the segment featured on Domingão do Faustão.

name: Street Fighter Zero 3
description: The Sega Saturn port of Street Fighter Alpha 3 uses all the features from the PlayStation version and the extra RAM of the console to include more frames and sprites, making it near arcade-perfect. Similarly to the Dreamcast version, Guile, Evil Ryu and Shin Akuma are immediately selectable, with the latter sharing a slot with his regular counterpart and playable via a special button combination. While the World Tour and Survival modes are virtually unchanged from the PlayStation version, the Dramatic Battle mode received some improvements with the inclusion of a 2-player mode and the addition of the Reverse Dramatic Battle mode, in which the player faces two computer-controlled characters simultaneously.

name: Street Fighter Alpha 3
description: The Dreamcast port of Street Fighter Alpha 3 uses all the added features from the PlayStation version but features a different World Tour mode. Guile, Evil Ryu and Shin Akuma are immediately selectable, although the latter still shares a slot with his regular counterpart and is playable via a special button combination. An online mode was added, allowing the player to display their high score. In addition, a Saikyo Dojo mode was added, which pits a character that the player has built up in World Tour mode against a very strong opponent who had to be downloaded from the Internet and changed every week.

name: Street Fighter Alpha 3
description: The PlayStation port of Street Fighter Alpha 3 has added new characters to the roster, including Juli, Juni, Balrog, Dee Jay, Fei Long and T. Hawk. They come with new portraits and their own scenarios. Guile, Evil Ryu and Shin Akuma have also been added as secret characters that can be unlocked through World Tour mode, a mode that allows players to strengthen and customize the fighting style of their chosen character while traveling the world.

name: My Sweet Artificial Lover
description:
You live in a world where androids are a little more than mindless drones that hand out papers in class, clean up at restaurants, and perform menial tasks around the house. However, there’s a company trying their hand at sentient androids, and what a coincidence that two beautiful girls have just transferred into your class.

Integrating with humanity is no easy feat, and you soon find yourself having to explain the most basic things to your new classmates. The more you spend time with them, the more they begin to fall for you… but how do you go about teaching androids about love and intimacy?!

name: Chart1647
description: Chart1647 is a classic rhythm game developed over many years and is a 4k game similar to Stepmania. It features a fully customized set of levels, importers from most modern SM formats and more!

name: Takishawa is Dead
description:
A dangerous criminal called Takishawa is on the loose, and a reward has
been offered for his capture. In an odd world full of characters who have
televisions for heads, you set out to find Takishawa, dodging traps and navigating difficult platforming sections along the way.

name: Ratyboy Adventures
description: In this 3D platformer game where we play as a mouse living in a big house, we try to collect the stars placed at certain points in the rooms of the house and overcome the challenging platform

name: Rafa's World + Axolotl + Cat Milk
description:
Take on the role of the boy Rafa in his own world full of creatures, monsters, diamonds, emeralds, boxes and a little shop to buy power-ups.

Explore over 50 different areas while trying to manage your stamina, passing through many types of traps.

This is a white little cat who loves to jump and to get into adventures around the town until he finds milk to drink. Once he accomplishes his mission, then it is time to go home.

name: Chezz
description:
Play fast chess in an all-new way!
Chezz breaks the rules to create the fastest, most frantic new way to play the classic board game.

Challenge yourself in a game that lets you move all the pieces at the same time. Fight quick online PVP battles in real time with other players, or solve hundreds of levels in adventure mode. Pieces change on each game board and can be upgraded. Fast like checkers, intense like chess. Play the ultimate board to action game conversion. Become the ultimate king or queen and join the Chezz revolution today!

name: Ludo Live!: Heroes and Strategy
description: Play a brand new, innovative game of Ludo with mythical heroes and epic battles. Plan your moves. Cast Spells. Decide which battles to fight and which heroes to play with. In Ludo Live! roll the dice and make decisions to destroy all your opponents with your heroes and win the game.

name: Align 12
description:
Move-Align Puzzle!
Creative Puzzle!
Different Puzzle!

name: Birds Blitz
description: Sin descripción

name: Voice of Cards Trilogy
description:
Voice of Cards is a quirky series of RPGs where the whole world is depicted through the medium of cards.

The Voice of Cards Trilogy bundles together all three titles from the series; Voice of Cards: The Isle Dragon Roars, Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden and Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden.

name: MiniCar Extreme: Car Driving Racing (Truck, Suv, Sedan, Cars)
description: This game gives you the feeling that such a real race without rules. Difficult battles against each other will provide you with very vivid emotions. A variety of cars and racing tracks will not let you get bored while playing. For practice, you can check out the Arcade mode. And for the more adventurous and experienced, there is an mode Championship with different tipe of deficlty. The Versus game mode will give you the opportunity to fight with your friends. Different abilities you can pickup , both useful and interfering with your victory, will not let you relax.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Bundle
description: Dive into award-winning Dungeons & Dragons RPG classics, enhanced for modern adventurers! Immerse yourself in epic RPGs where every choice matters. Your adventure awaits with these five enhanced editions…

name: DNF Duel: Who's Next
description:
The Nintendo Switch version of DNF Duel uses delay-based netcode instead of the rollback netcode used in the original releases. None of the releases currently support crossplay.

Action fighting at its extreme! One of the most popular and widely played RPGs in the world, Dungeon and Fighter is now back as a 2.5D action fighting game. Choose from 16 charming characters, each with their distinct skills and personalities. Outsmart, outplay, or downright beat up your opponents and become the master of the Ultimate Will!

name: Gothic Platformer Games Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Night of Spirits
description: Night of Spirits is an individual or online horror game for up to 4 players, where the main objective is to hunt down the ghosts that haunt the city.

name: T.D.Z. 3: Dark Way of Stalker
description: Atmospheric Stalker adventure in the post-Apocalypse world!

name: Dream Ploy Will
description: This is a 1V1 game, including round system, war chess, and strategy play. You can freely match your deck, command heroes, summon monsters, and release spells! Compete with game friends or strangers!

name: PowerShift
description: Speed across the shadownet desert at speed in the minimalist, 2.5D retro racer POWERSHIFT

name: Trash Horror Collection 3
description: We bring you 10 short horror/comedy games in this collection. Inspired by the "Tales From the Crypt" series and cult horror movies from the 80's/90's.

name: ForbiddenWord
description: Let the other person say the forbidden word! A psychological chat game that takes care of your own forbidden word and draws out the other player's forbidden words!

name: Chronicon Complete
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops - Digital Deluxe Bundle
description:
The Tiny Troopers: Global Ops Digital Deluxe Edition Includes:

- Tiny Troopers: Global Ops
- Tiny Troopers: Joint Ops
- The ‘Tiny Tales’ Comic Book
- The Tiny Troopers: Global Ops Original Soundtrack

name: Hello Princess
description:
A maze game set within a castle.
You have to solve the maze, reach the princess and save her.

name: Golf Odyssey
description: Get a hole in one and unlock new courses on this relaxing yet challenging golf game!

name: Built for Speed
description: Built for Speed is the best retro-racing game available for your mobile device today! Beat your friends and the top players on player made tracks; rise to the top of the league to prove you're the champion.

name: Real Cricket™ 16: English Bash
description:
From the makers of Real Cricket comes the excitement of the English T20 Bash!
Guide your favorite English T20 team to the top and win the biggest cricketing domestic crown in Britain.

Pick your favorite team full of superstars and compete against the best!
Be amongst the game's finest, use the entire arsenal of 27 cricketing shots to experience the most dynamic and realistic representation of our favorite sport on your mobile devices.

name: Armed Air Forces
description: Armed Air Forces offers all-embracing combat flight simulation experience on mobile devices. Finally you can play PC quality combat game anywhere and anytime you wish.

name: The World Hockey Championships
description:
Play a competitive real-time​ hockey game! Position your player to take your best shot and make epic saves in real time to become the next World Hockey Champion!
Play in multiplayer or single game mode, competing with people around the world in real time to win The World Hockey Championships.

name: Beast Lord
description: Beast Lord is a strategy game developed and published by Hobby Japan.

name: Best Play Baseball
description: Sin descripción

name: Aktie
description: Sin descripción

name: DevilutionX
description: DevilutionX is a port of Diablo and Diablo: Hellfire that strives to make it simple to run the game while providing engine improvements, bugfixes, and some optional quality of life features.

name: Maze Runner II
description: Sin descripción

name: Apple Sauce Beach
description: Sin descripción

name: Descent
description: Descent tells the story of an unnamed hero's journey into the bowels of a dark and mysterious cave. As he drops deeper and deeper into the darkness, a disgusting brown blob follows closely behind, advising him to turn around and return to the surface.

name: Mortal Trace
description: Online PvP 3D "snake" game. Avoid yours's and your opponents' growing tail or "Trace" and be the last left in the arena while trying to cut off and trap your opponents with your Trace.

name: Chaser
description: Developed over a couple of days, Chaser is not what it first appears to be. Players are presented with a simple black environment and take control of a green man chasing a turquoise figure. Over time, you’ll pick up speed, grab coins that the turquoise man throws out, and eventually trip and come to a standstill.

name: Queens
description: Queens is a very short but difficult platformer about a ruthless king who throws his many wives into a dangerous gauntlet whenever he tires of them. You lead each queen through the obstacles in the run and try to stay alive.

name: Din
description: Din puts you in the shoes of Billy, a popular guy who everybody wants to talk to. Unfortunately, everyone wants to talk to him at the same time and will get upset if he doesn’t respond appropriately.

name: Sham City
description: Strategy and planning game developed by Bug Neko Soft / Tainyan, similar to Simcity.

name: FallOver
description: In Fallover! You control an elderly british gentleman, who has lost his stability and keeps falling over.

name: Dungeon
description: Dungeon is a tragic platformer about what can happen in a castle, and how it affects people like you and me.

name: Paul Moose in Space World
description: Meet amazing alien species and visit deadly planets as Paul Moose in Paul Moose In Space World.

name: Pathways
description: Pathways explores the idea of interactive storytelling through abstract decisions and literal pathways. The hero walks through the same town each day, taking different routes and encountering separate stories that, when all brought together, make up his life story.

name: Cobblemon
description: Cobblemon is an open-source Pokémon mod for Minecraft, with the goal of being the mod for everyone.

name: Hungry for Home: A Cat's Tail
description:
Suspenders is off on a grand journey to get home!

With a food truck and his little brother Chibisuke in tow, come follow the Nyansukes as they travel the world!

Trapped in a box, and left across the globe, how do we get home...!? Luckily our new friends are here to help

name: Alternate Watch
description: A Mandela Catalogue themed spot the difference horror game. Report Alternate Anomaly encounters until 6 AM in order to survive the night.

name: Dice Fantasy
description: Dice Fantasy is a turn-based RPG grid fantasy action game from the Shock Price Advanced Series.

name: Funky Funny Aliens
description: Funky Funny Aliens is an edutainment title developed by Emotion Digital Software, released for the Apple Pippin.

name: Samurai Mech
description: Sin descripción

name: Samurai Mech II
description: Sin descripción

name: Elder Blaze
description: Sin descripción

name: SDS Star Divers
description: Action mech game developed by Cybelle.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Seaside Hill Zone
description:
Seaside Hill from Sonic Heroes comes to SRB2 as a single player map!
This map features multiple pathways, emblems, and custom enemies.

name: Mayu
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Fiber
description: Adventure science-fiction game developed by SolidState, Inc and NEC Interchannel.

name: Clone Ranger
description: Interactive adventure game, developed by CyberArts.

name: Aquamorphosis
description: It's a horror game that tells a story about a fisherman who loses his way into another world during fishing.

name: Beeknighted
description:
On a stormy evening a marauding troll absconds with a beehive while being pursued by hunters. While the hunter's plans go awry, the troll stumbles into their pitfall trap, dragging the unfortunate bee with him. Separated from the broken fragments of her hive and stranded during a storm, the bee must find temporary refuge in the caves below the Bugbear Antfort and escape to safety.

Meet friends and foes, discover treasures and traps, and traverse the dangerous caverns in this adventure inspired by Nintendo 64-era classics.

name: Song of the Sea VR
description:
Cartoon Saloon invites you to step inside the Great Storyteller’s Cavern inspired by their Oscar-nominated hand-drawn animated feature film ‘Song of the Sea’.

Experience immersion in one of the film’s beautiful, expressive environments and meet the unpredictable, zany Storyteller himself! Unravel the story of the Selkie and how the fate of all the faeries is connected to her own in this interactive narrative.

name: Jables's Adventure
description: Jables's Adventure is a casual platforming adventure game staring a young boy named Jables. One day an odd squid appears on his head an claims that Jables is the hero. The boy accepts his new title and sets out on an adventure filled with wild lumberjacks, burrowing cacti, and random facts about fruit.

name: UFO on Tape
description: The truth is out there! UFO on Tape puts you in the role of one lucky guy who has managed to spot a UFO. Fortunately, he’s got his trusty (and very shaky) camcorder on hand to film the evidence.

name: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade
description: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade is a short and sweet BL visual novel. Keldran and Ace are two centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister and If they cannot conquer their fears, they may find themselves wandering the halls forever.

name: Man Enough
description:
Why play one game when you can play four games at once? In Man Enough,
there are four completely different games all running at the same time and
you must use the arrow keys and the space bar to beat each simultaneously.

name: They Need To Be Fed
description: Run and jump through 11 crazy worlds to feed the monsters in this 360° gravity platformer. It doesn't matter which way you go; up or down, left or right, you can't fall off because of the 360° gravity!

name: Resident Evil 4: The Mercenaries
description: The Mercenaries is a long-running Resident Evil challenge mode that sees players attempt to defeat as many enemies as they can before the timer runs out - or you die. In the original Resident Evil 4, Mercenaries mode was unlocked upon completing the main game. This time, it will be a free DLC content post-launch.

name: Girlfriend vs. Boyfriend
description: In Girlfriend vs. Boyfriend, you play a guy who is in serious trouble with his girlfriend for eyeballing another woman. She proceeds to chase you, throwing all sorts of objects your way, including fruit, animals, and tables.

name: Go! Underground
description: Go! Underground (or Journey to the Center of the Earth) takes a player into the depths of the Earth to explore subterranean environments and collect relics. A treasure map gives hints as to the location of each relic, and your task is to unlock a variety of paths and find all 40.

name: Dungeons of Fayte
description: Dungeons of Fayte is a dungeon crawler for one to four players with enough content to keep either a single player or a group of friends going for a good while. The Bone Lord, ruler of the Underworld, is planning an attack and the heroes need to train in various dungeons before taking the Bone Lord and his cronies on.

name: And Everything Started To Fall
description: And Everything Started To Fall is a simple platformer about life and death. The protagonist starts at the bottom as a child and slowly works his way up to the top, passing through each stage of his life along the way.

name: Illuminator
description: Armed with just a flashlight, a boy sets out to save his sister from a band of nasty ghouls who have the ability to tear through the fabric of space and who travel from house to house in the dead of night.

name: Knight of the Living Dead
description: Camelot is being overrun by zombie knights, and only the brave Sir Galahad can hold them back and restore peace to the kingdom. Knight of the Living Dead is an action-packed arena slasher with constant waves of the undead that need to be slayed quickly.

name: Classic Night
description: The moon wants to be as bright as the sun, so it hires a skeleton called Harigol to help fulfil this dream. Classic Night is a strategy game with construction elements that follows Harigol as he goes about his assignment.

name: Jeopardy
description: Based on the hit television show, Jeopardy! for Game Boy features over 1,500 questions and support for two players. Before starting, you can enter the number of participants and their names. Gameplay consists of moving a cursor and selecting a category and money value. After the question (or answer) appears, you have ten seconds to buzz in. Answering involves selecting each letter on an alphabet display to spell out one or more words. After the first two rounds, players with positive dollar amounts can play in Final Jeopardy! The player with the most money at the end of this round wins the game. For two-player games, you can either link two systems together or share one Game Boy.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Sealed Palace
description:
An Ocarina of Time romhack.

Lots of gameplay in various areas and dungeons with custom cutscenes, songs and much more. Good luck finding all 100 skulltula tokens and 20 hearts!

name: Gnomitaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Slingshot Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Refixion
description: An interactive game, developed by Synergy Inc. It features three modes: The Anthrax Robot Works and The Anthrax Robot Works (Funny Fish MIX) are interactive music pieces, while Shangri-La is a point-and-click adventure.
