name: Refixion II: Museum or Hospital
description: Sin descripción

name: Refixion III: The Reindeer Story
description: Interactive novel from the Refixion series. It also features the visuals A Ride in the Snow and A Clown's Holiday.

name: Your Final Days
description: A NES-Like action game where a small robot, Orb, has to venture through four locations to get stronger and fight the corruption, on a strict time limit, while paying extra attention to resource management.

name: The House of Evil Grandmother
description:
You find yourself waking up in a room. You have been locked up in an old, decrepit house by Crazy Grandmother, a crazy old woman who hunts her prey with a bloodied baseball bat.
Explore and find items and tools to open the various locks Crazy Grandmother keeps on her front door, all while outrunning her pursuit.

In Your mission to unlock the front door, you must find hammer, that is also a weapon that can knock Crazy Grandmother out for a 15 seconds, battery and main door key.

Will You be able to escape this prison or will You succumb to her unending chase and face Your doom in the walls of the house?

name: Tenka Touitsu
description: Tenka Touitsu is a strategy game set in feudal Japan.

name: Kujira Monogatari
description: Sin descripción

name: Evilmun Online
description: Evilmun Online - a separate part of your favorite online game mode for all platforms.

name: Flappy 95
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man 2: Atari De-Make
description: A fan remake of Mega Man 2 with less detailed graphics, new level design, and a save system.

name: Cosmic Dungeon
description: Cosmic Dungeon is a rogue-like game set in space, where players can explore unique dungeons filled with challenging enemies and treasure. With an array of different items and weapons to collect, players must strategically navigate the dangers of each level to progress deeper into the dungeon.

name: Trail Hogs
description: The Trail Hogs is a bicycle jousting platform adventure game where you play as a cyclist with bumpers in a fight to reclaim your bicycle kingdom, Hog Haven. You cannot die in this game and it has some unique features. Difficulty is moderate to hard.

name: Eloriasha
description: Inspired by the classics, Eloriasha is a simple yet challenging action-platformer about a man who's trying to save the world.

name: Brageskålen
description: Travel to Veøya in the Viking Age and solve a dangerous mystery with cunning and song!

name: Hellgineers
description: Help the minions of the underworld across bubbling pools of lava with rickety bridges and non-regulated constructions. Will you go for the easiest route, or test your skills and aim for the coveted skulls? Return to completed challenges to perfect your builds!

name: Living with Horses: My Horse Farm
description: Run your own riding stable full of horses and take good care of your animals and your guests. Ride freely around the open game world, through a wide variety of landscapes. The riding controls are intuitive. Speed, skill and courage are required for the mounted games – riding games that are both thrilling and fun! Train hard and claim victory in the tournament!

name: Quiz Thiz Croatia
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Alpha Warrior
description: Alpha Warrior is a retro, space shooter where the player engages in flight combat with enemy terrestrials and arcade style bosses. Blast your way through 12 exciting levels while stacking power-ups to become the most feared pilot in the galaxy.

name: Fearz!
description: Fearz! is a fast-paced game of observation in which all players play at the same time.

name: WinterCraft: Forest Survival
description:
You are in a winter forest and trying to survive at any cost! Can you survive and find your missing father?

WinterCraft is a survival game set in a winter forest where you will face dangers in a vast free world. Get resources, set up a camp, hunt wild animals and explore snow-covered forests! Every day in winter survival can be the last day on earth!
Many adventures await you: story quests, survival in the forest, exploration, hunting, gathering and crafting. You will have to learn a lot to survive: get food, melt snow, hunt animals and keep a fire!

name: Adventures in Equica: Unicorn Training
description:
Master powerful magic, venture through dungeons, and explore the monster-filled forest of Equica! Clover is the unicorn apprentice of Grand Swirllock the Bearded. She needs to learn the 10 basic combat spells every mage must master to survive fights against the monsters of Equica.

Traverse deadly dungeons to unlock more spells and extend your life energy! Beat all the dungeon bosses to prove you’re tough enough to take on any dangerous quest!

name: Ultimate Skate
description:
The most adrenaline inducing skateboarding game ever. If you want to skate in the most hardcore and fun way, this is the game for you! This simulator lets you build your own custom board and skate around different parks and shred objects.
Choose between 30 different boards and 9 different truck varieties to show your true skater personality!

Use swipes to preform tricks and push the board forward with natural ease. You can also record video replays and send them to your friends! This app has everything you need to become a legendary skater.
Loved by skaters all over the world.

name: The Reacher
description: The Reacher is a platform game with different aspects in it. Run, slide and swing for reaching the goal. It is designed for speed runs.

name: Field Clashers
description: Take your team to glory, using a keen strategy and tactical prowess to overcome your opponents!

name: Zong
description: Zong is a first-person VR adventure game that takes you on a journey through ancient Eastern history and culture.

name: Tap Tap Driver
description:
Tap Tap Driver is a fun and challenging endless driving game. Drive your car along the zigzag road in a dynamically generated city. Tap the screen to steer the car left and right. Compete with your friends and compare or beat their highest score.
Tap Tap Driver will test your agility, alertness, and timing. It is a good eye and hands coordination exercise.

name: Rapid Roller
description: Roll in a minimalistic, colorful world and see how far you can travel! Roll over jump pads for extra score. But don't hit the walls or spikes!

name: Terrella
description:
Opposites attract as you create your own gravity and anti-gravity using four colors. Find the best solution to guide your way through each world as quickly as possible. Watch out for the glowing obstacles. While they look pretty, they are not friendly! Play your friends in real-time with the multiplayer mode or challenge them to beat your scores.

It’s a race against time to set new high scores for yourself or beat the scores of your friends. Terrella’s companion, Boost, can help her out of a sticky situation. When timed just right, Boost can also help Terrella make it through a level faster to get the top score.

name: Trench Racer
description: Race through trenches and underground tunnels blasting your way through enemy strong-holds with an array of powerful weapons. Reach the wormhole gate to escape before you're destroyed or your craft runs out of energy.

name: Coal Burnout
description: Beat your competition in Multiplayer PVP by establishing a quick get away. In Coal Burnout, you'll be able to use a variety of trains to get ahead of your competition. Get Coal Burnout today!

name: Wankuru
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Retro Platformer Collection
description: Our partner Leoful has announced a collection of four Nintendo Switch games we have developed or ported to Nintendo Switch. The Super Retro Platformer Collection will release in Asia on 13th of January 2023

name: MazeBrew
description: Adventure point-and-click game developed by MazeBox.

name: Next Power
description: Action RPG developed by Art System and published by Gakugei.

name: Star Wars: Starfighter - Special Edition
description: The Special Edition of Star Wars Starfighter for Xbox features high-quality air and space combat, with added missions, a two-player mode, expanded racing and capture-the-flag play, and improved graphics. Set in the Star Wars universe and inspired by The Phantom Menace, players must save Naboo from the Trade Federation's invasion. Players choose from three pilots, each with a unique ship: Rhys, a Naboo pilot-in-training with the N-1 starfighter; Vana, a Naboo expatriate with an ultra-fast, stealthy ship; and Nym, an alien pirate with a powerful, heavily armed starship.

name: Sotsugyou: Graduation
description: Sin descripción

name: Moon
description: Exploration game developed by OverRise, Inc.

name: Golly! Ghosts! Goal!
description: Sin descripción

name: Miss
description: Sin descripción

name: You Find Yourself in a Room
description: YFYIAR is the drunken uncle of text-based adventures: Abusive, abrasive, and maybe a little funny. Use your keyboard to enter commands. Use your brain to demonstrate that you’re more existentially valuable than a robot with skin.

name: Viricide
description: Clear out the viruses that are infecting a chronically depressed AI. Buy upgrades, shoot bad guys, and ponder where the cutoff lies for being considered a living thing.

name: This is a Work of Fiction
description:
A game for people who like strange mysteries and puzzle solving.

This is a Work of Fiction is a game dedicated to conspiracy-theory websites, like the old one about the time cube (find it on the internet archive some time – it’s incredible). It’s a collection of puzzles with no written instructions other than their titles, and completing them unlocks pieces of a story about a person who has been finding clues about an impossibly huge and amorphous conspiracy (but be warned – it doesn’t involve any elder gods, or aliens, or robots, or politicians, or deadpan guys in suits, or giant companies).

name: NetMaze: A Funnyman Game
description:
netMaze allows you and up to 15 other players to explore different parts of Cyberspace together through the high-octane competitive Brawl mode or the creative Sandbox mode.

Take the maze by storm or build out your own virtual world using your very own Funnyman, a digital avatar that you can customize to your liking with different colors, weapons, and more!

name: Downtown Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Arch Rivals
description: Sin descripción

name: Otter Ocean
description: Are otter’s just the oceans’ hamsters? They’re playful, fuzzy, and fit in the palm of your hand (at least in this kawaii game app!). Go on a scavenger hunt to find more members of the cute tamagotchi kawaii family. If you like adventure games with a treasure hunt where you can train your pet animals - Otter Ocean is just for you.

name: Monster Pet Shop
description: Run your own Monster Pet Shop that grows, exhibits, and sells fantastic magical creatures. Play with, care and feed your creatures to maximize happiness. Happy creatures award more money when you find them good homes. Customize your Monster Pet Shop with three different habitats – Dirt, Grass and Water, and unlock ever more wonderful creatures.

name: Sp:In
description:
Control the Nuggle’s spaceship with a single tap and collect the Light Energy needed to fight their biggest threat: a supermassive black hole that is slowly absorbing the Nuggle’s Planet.
But be careful, it may be harder than it seems! You will find many obstacles to overcome in your journey through space such as asteroids, deadly dust clouds or radioactive zones. Not everything is as it seems and you’ll need to hone your skills to master your spaceship’s speed and movements!

name: Love Connection!
description: Here you will be a star! Take advantage of your passion for love to connect all the graphics and absorb them. The more graphics you can connect and absorb, the higher score you will get. Come to challenge yourself!

name: Swipe: Maze solver
description:
A new type of one hand playable maze game!
Touching colors and piano musics will get your eyes and ears.

name: Crazy One
description: Play with friends and share the fun with family. Challenge real players online or computer players in real time. Compete against top players worldwide. Chat with other players using emoji and send each other gifts.

name: Rainbow Splash
description: Discover what’s at the end of the rainbow in the new addictive puzzle game, Rainbow Splash! Seemingly simple in concept, this game will test your puzzle solving skills. As you progress through the game, you’ll reveal new acts each with a new twist. Finally when you’re ready, try the challenge mode to truly put your skills to the test.

name: Monster Busters: Hexa Blast
description: Do you think you have what it takes to match the same colored monsters, and save the gingerbread cookie friends? Monster Busters: Hexa Blast is a brilliant match three puzzle game – a brand new yet classic match 3 style game with a hexagonal twist. If you love fun casual games and match three games, you are bound to love Hexa Blast.

name: Rat vs. Cat
description: Mr. Joey Mouse has a very sweet and little dream of filling his hole with all the cheese of this world.

name: Letteral
description: Letteral is a beautiful and clever word game, that you can play for free against your friends or anybody in the world. But be aware, word wizards; Only with a superior strategy will you be able to beat your opponents.

name: Stone of Destiny
description:
Brand new Chinese style match-3 puzzle game from Fangtang!
Challenge your skills across 9 areas and 73 levels in the the definitive puzzle game. Gain the help of mythical Chinese creatures and tools to discover your destiny!
Can you find the ultimate truth?

name: The Soul of Dracula
description: The Soul of Dracula is a dark Japanese platformer heavily inspired by the classic Castlevania series. A vampire hunter journeys to the Dark Prince’s castle armed with a rather familiar whip, which he can use to cut down the skeletons, bats, and ghouls that cross his path.

name: Death Tour
description: Deliver highly valuable cargo, but watch out: you’re being hunted down. Drive through the racy storyline at full speed, reveal the secret of the stolen briefcase and revenge a gang of cold-blooded assassins.

name: Rage Racing 3D
description: Like Parkour? Or Racing games? Enjoy them all in our game, this is the only chance in market.

name: Paper Champion
description:
Deliver papers to your customers with this fast-paced, fun, and addictive game.
Test your skills by trying to deliver the most papers without crashing into oncoming traffic!
Time your throw perfectly and the paper will land on the customers doorstep for more points!

name: Dunk Tower
description:
Do you like basketball games? Do you like casual games?
Then find the two together in Dunk Tower! An incredible, challenging and addictive game!
Score baskets and overcome the challenges before the water covers your tower!
And more, have you thought about play basketball with a soda or a barrel? Collect all crazy skins for your basketballs!

name: Pro Tennis WTA Tour
description: Sin descripción

name: The Hive
description: In The Hive you play as Alex Rig, a reporter who was investigating a missing persons case when he discovers a heavily-fortified research facility while snooping around for clues. Similar to Iji, Prince of Persia and Flashback, Alex will be doing a lot of climbing up platforms and crawling through air vents to find ammunition or health-replenishing items that he can keep in his inventory for later use.

name: HewDraw Remix
description: HewDraw Remix is a comprehensive overhaul of Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, inspired by the fast and technical gameplay of previous titles like Super Smash Bros. Melee and Project M. The mod offers unique changes to character movesets and core mechanics, and makes changes to UI and control options to provide more competitive depth and accessibility.

name: Monster Jam: Maximum Destruction
description: Sin descripción

name: Cubix Robots for Everyone: Showdown
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Hoops
description: Tapwave Zodiac port of Street Hoops.

name: Disney's Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Home Run King
description: Sin descripción

name: RoboCop
description: Game Boy Advance port of RoboCop.

name: Friendly Premonition
description:
A murder just took place in the town of Greenvale, and it's affected everyone. You play as a psychically-attuned stranger to town who has a feeling that there's more to some of these people than meets the eye. Lucky for you, you're charming enough that people trust you with a whole host of secrets.

Visit various different locations around Greenvale and talk to the cast. Collect illustrated trading cards after getting to know people through dialogue options. View a range of familiarly odd items with new descriptions. Even flirt with the people you've made friends with, if you're so inclined.

Friendly Premonition is a talking sim where you can meet every character from the original game and listen to them talk your ear off about a range of interests. Once they've run out of specific topics, they'll eagerly share whatever thought enters their head. A select number of characters even have special mechanics for you after you've talked to them enough, so make sure you check back.

name: Tux, of Math Command
description: “Tux, of Math Command” lets kids hone their arithmetic skills while they defend penguins from incoming comets, or offers them a chance to explore the asteroid belt with only their factoring abilities to bring them through safely!

name: Flood the Chamber
description: A prisoner has escaped from solitary confinement and is trying to escape from prison. As he runs off towards the exit, a guard shouts “Flood the chamber!” and water begins to rise, leaving the rogue in quite a predicament.

name: Puppet Tale
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Goku Mod
description: A character mod for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate that adds in Goku, with a custom moveset.

name: Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse
description:
To save his girlfriend Minnie from the wicked witch Mizrabel, Mickey must venture into the Castle of Illusion. Crossing six levels (including a magical forest, a toy land and a candy world), he must collect the gems of the rainbow in order to confront and defeat the witch.

Each level features unique obstacles, enemies and a final boss. The enemies can be defeated by jumping on top of them. An alternative way is to pick up objects lying around (like rocks in the forest or blue balls in the toy level) and throwing them at the enemies. Mickey's ability to pick up things and carry them around also leads to some sort of puzzle-oriented gameplay. By placing objects in the right spot and jumping off of them, he can get to areas that are otherwise out of reach. In some levels, he also has to collect keys to open doors. A unique type of object is the treasure chest - by jumping on top of one or throwing it, Mickey gets access to its contents, which might include extra lives, a health power-up or coins to collect for points.

name: Darkfate
description: Darkfate is an exploration platformer that follows Chris Freeman, a man whose memory has failed him. He has no idea why he’s wandering around a snowy mountainside in freezing weather and decides to venture into nearby caves to seek out answers. During his odyssey, he keeps a record of his thoughts in a journal.

name: Jennifer Janowski is Doomed
description: Sin descripción

name: Teppoman
description: Teppoman is a simple run ‘n’ gun platformer that stars a naked hero. Terrorists have taken a number of your fellow nudists hostage and your job is to bust in, take the enemies out, and free your unclothed friends.

name: Tombed
description: If anyone can overcome the dangers hidden away in the tombs of TamaraKama and find the incredible treasures of legend, it must surely be brave explorer Danger Jane and her magnificent shovelling skills.

name: Day at the Races
description: The aim of this "light-hearted" horse racing game is to win enough money to purchase, maintain and enter your horse in the prestigious Day at the Races Cup, held on the 5th race of the final day. Good luck!

name: I Was in the War
description: I Was in the War is either a philosophical look at how war can escalate out of control or an action-packed—and rather distorted—arcade game that requires quick reactions and a steady hand. It all depends on your approach.

name: Hoshi Saga 4: Ringo
description: Hoshi Saga Ringo is the fourth installment in the Hoshi Saga series, and while it might not be as difficult as its predecessors, Ishii-san brings new life to the game with his beautiful artwork and use of gradients.

name: Gravity Hook
description:
Gravity Hook is a 2D arcade game. Play as a cube armed with a grappling hook and survive in a closed space for as long as you can.
This is the predecessor to Gravity Hook HD.

name: Use Boxmen
description: Use Boxmen is a tricky platform puzzler whose premise is exactly what it says on the tin. The main character can create clones of himself to interact with the surroundings and help him safely obtain the special box that’s located somewhere in the level.

name: DefeatMe
description: DefeatMe is an experimental shooter by Kenta Cho. Played on a single screen, the player needs to take out one or more enemies before a horizontal line, moving from the top to the bottom of the area, hits the player's ship.

name: Time4Cat
description: A stray cat stumbles upon a special collar that allows the wearer to control time. The feline sets out during a busy lunch break and uses the collar’s unique power to collect the morsels of food dropped by busy, clumsy workers.

name: Ben 10 VR
description:
Ben 10 VR game that brings great VR experience and Ben10 scenario to players.
Let’s get your Omnitrix to transform to Four Arms and Blastheat to show your power and skills for defense earth!

name: Chase Goose 2
description: A monster is chasing you, escape - but the game is doing it's best to stop you...

name: One Button Bob
description: Help One Button Bob traverse a dangerous castle and find a treasure via the simple click of a mouse button. You click anywhere in the game to make Bob perform various actions—like jumping over pits or running away from heavy boulders Indiana Jones style.

name: You Have No Legs
description: Control Jack, an archaeology student who lost both his legs during an earthquake while working in Teotihuacan, Mexico. Look for ancient treasures and move around the temple using only his arms!

name: Stay Alive
description: Stay Alive is a game with simple gameplay, designed in retro pixel art style, with elements of mythology and roguelite. Sometimes running away isn't the solution, but sometimes you shouldn't even look back, and giving up isn't always the end.

name: One Step Back
description: Explore the mind of a man stuck with his memories- only by forgetting the past can he advance.

name: Fault Line
description: Faultline features a clever puzzling mechanic that makes for some unique platforming action. The main character is a robot who can launch his hands out to grab hold of nodes in the level. These nodes can then be folded over each other, hiding entire sections of the level from view.

name: Ben 10 Omni-Charged
description: Ben 10: Omni-Charged is a 5-minute, 1-3 Player VR Cooperative Multiplayer game that puts players in a Powertrix suit armed with overpowered alien abilities. Suit up and save the city from Vilgax and his robotic army.

name: Obelisk
description: Sin descripción

name: Santa Claus Journey
description: You are Santa Claus. Deliver all gifts to all people around the world. Precision and quick response is required to accomplish the task in this fun game. Best played during the holiday season.

name: Quest for Sarah
description: The history of the cursed Belmont bloodline is in the pages hidden throughout the game. Talking to the townsfolk will give you valuable information in finding Sarah before it is too late.

name: Perfect Detective Manual
description: Adventure point-and-click game. Production and planning made by Pleasuredome, Inc., and distribution was handled by Dynaware, Inc.

name: Super Mario Solarshine
description:
Experience the Galaxy in a whole new way!
Super Mario Solarshine is a completely new adventure that brings many of your favourite Galaxy levels into Super Mario Sunshine.

name: King Boo's Dream Invasion
description: King Boo has invaded the Dream World, and it's up to Prof. E. Gadd to stop him!

name: Sengoku Cyber: Fujimaru Jigoku-hen
description: Sengoku Cyber - Fujimaru Jigokuhen is a tactical strategy role-playing game that follows the ninja Fujimaru and his ninja clan.

name: The Penguins of Madagascar: The Helmet
description: When Kowalski invents a helmet that turns thoughts into actions, it’s only a matter of time before King Julien tries to get his hands on it. Once in control of the helmet, King Julien turns up the power to such a level that he can’t control it, and it’s up to the Penguins to find a way to stop it before chaos takes over the zoo.

name: Lost Star Saga
description: Lost Star Saga is a built in-game in the Glucoboy peripheral for the GBA.

name: Knock 'Em Downs
description: Knock 'Em Downs is a built in-game in the Glucoboy peripheral for the GBA.

name: Kinnikuman Muscle Fight
description:
Muscle Fight is a free competitive fighting game released in 1999 by Matayan.
Based on the Yudetamago manga "Kinnikuman", created using Enterbrain's (formerly ASCII) software "2D Fighting Maker 95".

name: Spies Spies Spies
description: This is a pixel-style role-playing game with exploration and adventure. weapon upgrade, random state, random skill, random prop, armor upgrade, store, alien copy, spy, fog, civilian kill, escape, super magic outfit, roguelike, poisonous fog, trap, automatic aiming, infinite refresh.

name: Asteroids: Multiplayer
description: A modern version of the classic arcade game

name: Zombeast
description:
Survive the Zombie Apocalypse!
Exciting offline shooter with survival elements! You have to shoot hordes of the undead in the world of the victorious zombie apocalypse. On the Earth of the future, all the problems of humanity have faded into the background, and now everyone only cares about survival.

name: Hai! Tetsuman-desu
description: In this Japanese game, you control Tetsuman, a nuclear powered humanoid robot designed to learn the Osaka dialect. As the robot learns, it absorbs your ethical values and this has consequences for good or evil.

name: Tetsuman Gaiden
description: Game for kids featuring Tetsuman, developed for the Apple Pippin.

name: Nostalgia
description: Nostalgia is a 32-level megawad for limit-removing source ports. It was released by Alex Decker (myolden) in August 2022 and combines vanilla-style aesthetics with modern map design philosophies. Most maps are smallish in size, with a focus on easy-to-medium difficulty and fewer than 100 monsters. While level geometry and texturing is intentionally kept simple, the wad contains many instances of environmental storytelling as well as occasional doomcute detailing. Each level in the wad is named after a metal song that came out prior to 2000. The midi soundtrack is assembled from various sources from inside and outside the Doom community, containing no bespoke tracks.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Air Strip
description: Airstrip is a DLC for Gas Station Simulator. A story-driven dlc allowing you to build a small airstrip close to your gas station.

name: Shinsoku Igodou
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Konchuuden
description:
Battle Insects Den is a strategy role-playing game for the PlayStation and was released by Jaleco in 1999.

The game progresses through a series of strategy and adventure parts.

In the strategy part, the player controls an allied insect on a battle stage that resembles a chessboard, and when it comes into contact with an enemy insect, the game shifts to a command-selectable battle.

In the adventure part, the player controls the main character on the overlooking map, talking with other characters and shopping.

You can also connect your PocketStation to play mini-games and bring the items you obtain into the main game.

name: Sakin II
description: Follow-up for the album Sakin (砂金), by Kazuyuki Sekiguchi.

name: Master Blaze
description: Role playing game, developed and published by Nihon Create.

name: The Linear RPG
description: The Linear RPG is a short "RPG" game that involves leveling up a character while reading a ridiculous RPG story.

name: Broken Spectre
description: Broken Spectre is a cosmic horror narrative adventure game developed in collaboration with the makers of The Blair Witch Project. A cryptic message left by her father takes Casey back to the abandoned trails of Coldblood Mountain, a remote wilderness that has haunted her family for generations. In addition to its unique, macabre visual style, Broken Spectre takes advantage of the Meta Quest 2’s immersive hand-tracking controls to bring unparalleled realism to the game’s gruesome body horror elements.

name: Artist Life Simulator: Cakes and Guns
description: Adds 200+ new events, 14 Cakes, 9 Pistols, ~100 illustrations & other new content to the base game. Fully save compatible.

name: Graamaseva
description: Graamaseva is the first top-down view, horizontal scrolling run n' gun arcade game.

name: Wizard Shrimp
description: Wizard Shrimp is a bullet-hell roguelike game where you play as a Shrimp who inexplicably is also a Wizard?! Battle your way out of three different areas whilst gaining many different upgrades and power ups to become the most powerful Shrimp this world has ever seen!

name: Space Slaughter
description: Test your skill while trying to unlock all ships by fighting on 6 unique maps full of different kind of enemies!

name: Gorufoo
description: A Golf-like sport for the new generation.

name: Spider Evolution
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Survivors Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Dream Land
description: This is a pixel art style open world survival adventure game. Player wake up in a strange dream world, start an unknown journey. Player need to acquire resources through foraging, hunting, mining, fighting,etc.,to build bases, to craft equipment, to cook foods, and to develop himeself/herself.

name: Rival Gears
description: Sin descripción

name: Grand Sanctuary: Troth of Angel
description: Sin descripción

name: Cowboys & Rustlers
description: Tear-jerking story about a friendship between a man and a horse. Face life’s headwinds with the help of universal tools of communication - revolvers, lasso, emotional intelligence and dynamite. Search for the sense of spittoons (and life) on the prairies where mean words ricochet as hard as bullets.

name: Dan
description: Sin descripción

name: Shooting Command
description: Sin descripción

name: Silicon Scream
description: First person point-and-click adventure game, developed by Off World Communications and published by JVC Advanced Media.

name: MLB The Show 23: The Captain Edition
description:
The MLB The Show 23 Captain Edition on PlayStation includes:

A copy of the full game for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4
New Era MLB The Show 9FIFTY limited edition cap
Limited edition SteelBook
Four days early access
Double daily login rewards (for the life cycle of MLB The Show 23)
Additional digital items:
Captain’s Choice Pack (x1)
To be announced Choice Pack (x1)
To be announced Uniform Choice Pack (x1)
Gold Choice Packs (x2)
Show Packs (x5)
Ballplayer Pack (x1)
Derek Jeter Cover art bat skin (x1)
10,000 Stubs

name: The Tower of Silka
description: Sin descripción

name: Ibis AM
description: All I want you to do is catch fish and search for others who seem hungry. You are only a bird.

name: Indiepocalypse #2
description: Issue #2 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: p0nd
description: P0nd is a one-button, flash game by PeanutGallery.

name: Almost Total Mayhem
description: Almost Total Mayhem is a 2D team-based action platformer that pits two teams against each other in an attempt to destroy the other's base, which comes in the form of medieval forts. In addition teams of knights in armor must also protect their own base from attacks. Also hindering the player's progress is that there is only a single bomb on the map. The graphics come in hand-drawn form on lined A4 paper, and look like someone has doodled them. There is a two player co-operative game mode available for use on a single Xbox 360 console for 2-player split-screen games.

name: Looming
description: Looming follows an unnamed protagonist as he explores the plains of a mysterious world, finds clues, and uncovers a variety of beautiful intertwining stories.

name: Action Turnip
description: Jump, double-jump, and shoot! You play as a little turnip in this odd game. There are 2 modes: Run'n'Gun and Turnabalt.

name: Pokémon Vanguard
description: Enter Ayrei, A region split into four separate quadrants, each blooming with life.

name: Lemmings & Oh No! More Lemmings
description:
This Windows port contains two complete games from DMA Design's classic 'Lemmings' puzzle series, which are all mind-boggling games of multiple skill levels, featuring fantastically animated graphics and simple yet addictive gameplay.

These Lemmings are the wackiest collection of misdirected rodents ever seen on your screen! They simply walk blindly through the world in the hope of safely reaching their home at the end of each level - unfortunately these levels include steep drops, gaps in the ground, barriers, rivers, and many other hazards.

Your task is to rescue the Lemmings across 114 levels of fast-paced puzzling.
You are not in direct control of any individual Lemming, but of a cross-hair, which can be moved over any of the Lemmings. Along the bottom are a selection of roles which can be assigned to an individual Lemming, including climbing, floating and bashing. You must click to select the appropriate function, then click on the Lemming to activate it. Each level has a different range of skills on offer, a different amount of Lemmings, and a different percentage target of Lemmings to be rescued in order to progress.

'Oh No! More Lemmings' is the follow-up to Lemmings. The game features 100 new levels, and all-new graphics and music. This port features a slightly increased quality in graphics. The UI is also larger and features more detailed information. The music is also replaced with original scores of royalty-free music in much higher quality. The intro is absent.

name: Bravely Second: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers
description: Bravely Second: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers is a pre-launch prelude to the Bravely Second: End Layer and released as a demo in the eShop. In contrast to the full game, the demo features a unique storyline and simplified versions of some gameplay elements. The prelude focuses on the Three Cavaliers – Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard, and Nikolai Nikolanikov.

name: Run, Jesus Run!
description: You have 10 seconds to redeem the humanity.

name: De Cara no Muro
description: De Cara no Muro was a web browser game based on a segment featured on Domingão do Faustão.

name: PlayPen
description: A gigantic community-built adventure game. A nonsensical pixel art wiki adventure. A toilet wall for the internet.

name: Poto & Cabenga
description: Poto & Cabenga makes players adapt to a rather unique control scheme: manipulating two different characters with a single key. The game features a colourful alien rider who has been pulled from his faithful steed by a nasty flying creature, and the rider must run through the creature’s belly to escape before it begins digesting.

name: Cannelé & Nomnom: Defective Agency
description: Cannelé & Nomnom: Defective Agency is a fantasy comedy interactive fiction game. Players follow an amnesic individual who hires a duo of disastrous detectives in order to investigate three mysteries.

name: Jogo dos 10
description: Jogo dos 10 is a web browser game based on the segment featured on Domingão do Faustão.

name: Quietus
description: As he’s taking a man’s life, Death decides to have a little fun. He tells the man that he will give him his life back along with everything he ever wanted—if the man can survive the Gauntlet of Hell.

name: Specter Spelunker Shrinks
description: Specter Spelunker Shrinks is about a platforming hero who will jump, grow, shrink, and whatever else it takes to make it back to his home on the moon.

name: Kira Kira Aso BD
description: Kira Kira Aso BD is a port of the erotic visual novel Kira Kira for Blu-Ray players.

name: Record Tripping
description: An immersive gaming experience that begins with the scratch of a record.

name: Sonic Storm
description: Sonic Storm is a Sonic fan game that takes place after Sonic CD. This game takes inspiration from Y2K and street culture, from its stylised shading and user interface to its heavy focus on grinding and maintaining combos.

name: Kinnikuman Muscle Grand Prix Max 2: Tokumori
description:
A 3D hybrid wrestling/fighting game that is an updated port called Kinnikuman Muscle Grand Prix 2 Tokumori for the PlayStation 2.

It is the sequel to the original Kinnikuman arcade game Kinnikuman Muscle Grand Prix 2, that was originally released for the Namco System 256 arcade board.

name: Blue Knight
description: Explore an alien planet in a mission to clear it of enemy threats, ready for a new human colony. Pixel rich game with cool twists.

name: Vox Populi, Vox Dei
description: Vox Populi, Vox Dei is a platformer Flash game developed by weremsoft and published on Kongregate on September 1, 2009.

name: Corporate Climber
description: It takes hard work and dedication to earn a seat in the boardroom of a big corporation these days. Corporate Climber chronicles one man’s climb from lowly janitor to suit-wearing bigwig—and then his swift fall from grace.

name: Obey Me! Nightbringer
description: An otome game where you raise seven ikemen demon brothers to YOUR liking. Enjoy your life in the Devildom with Obey Me! Nightbringer!

name: Dangerous Dave Champion's Edition
description:
The entire Dangerous Dave collection is here! From the 1988 original to the 1990 PC classic to the final 2021 remaster, all nine of Dave's adventures are here in this Champion's Edition! Here is the treasure locked within:

1988 Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
1990 Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
1991 Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion
1991 Double Dangerous Dave
1992 Dangerous Dave Returns
1993 Dangerous Dave's Risky Rescue
1993 Dave Goes Nutz!
1995 Dangerous Dave Goes Nutz!
2021 Dangerous Dave Remaster
Pirate's Treasure Map Hint Guide for Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
Contains BOTH Windows and MacOS versions

name: Boondog
description: Harking back to the days of classic precision platformers such as Flashback and Prince of Persia, Boondog demands that you carefully consider each move that you make: a single incorrect leap, turn, or drop can end in disaster.

name: Boxgame
description: In the three-dimensional world of Boxgame, it’s hard to know which way is up. As you walk and jump around the perimeter of the game’s giant translucent boxes, floors can become walls, walls can become ceilings, and players will become disoriented.

name: Maverick
description: In Maverick, you are a gunslinger in the wild—rather green—West. Since the hero cannot walk, he must instead use the momentum from firing his pistols rapidly to propel himself past numerous obstacles and dangers.

name: Os Encolhidos
description: Os Encolhidos is a web browser game based on the segment featured on Domingão do Faustão.

name: Where We Remain
description: Where We Remain is an adventure set on a desert island, shown from a zoomed out, almost top-down view. The content is procedurally-generated and the setup of the island is different for each session. At first glance it seems similar to the 8 and 16 bit Zelda games, but it only borrows that shape to tell its story.

name: Little Friends: Puppy Island
description: Get ready for a pawsome puppy adventure in Little Friends: Puppy Island! Discover exciting locations, dig up hidden treasures, build and expand your holiday resort, and meet plenty of lovable little friends to care for on your very own un-paw-gettable, tropical island adventure!

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Thrill of Combat
description: The Thrill of Combat is quite possibly one of the most disorientating experiences you’ll ever have, even though the concept sounds simple (if a little bizarre): fly your helicopter into enemy territory, kill the soldiers, cut out their vital organs—and repeat.

name: Park Beyond: Day-1 Admission Ticket Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Sports Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Fighter 6: Steelbook Edition
description: Get a nice steelbook cover with your Street Fighter 6 in this exclusive edition.

name: Rocketbirds: Revolution!
description: Rocketbirds: Revolultion! is a 2D cinematic action-adventure puzzler game made in flash, developed by Ratloop Asia. It features rich visuals and classic 2D gameplay. Players take control of Hardboiled Chicken in a world filled with angry and often violent birds.

name: Curious George
description: Sin descripción

name: Fetish Fighters
description: Sin descripción

name: Aries Driving Game
description: Aries Driving Game is an in-browser minigame based on the Aries Music Video. You play as Noodle driving her Buggy, trying to complete the race in Morocco before 2D and Murdoc. The game was released on September 4th, 2020, along with Lyric Video for Aries.

name: Freekstyle
description: A Game Boy Advance port of Freekstyle.

name: Sonic Origins Plus: Day One Edition
description:
Experience the collected adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog in the newly remastered Sonic Origins Plus! With 16 legendary Sonic titles including 12 Game Gear games, new playable characters, modes, challenges, behind the scenes content, and more, this is the definitive way to play these classic games!

Those who purchase the Physical Edition will also receive a retro-inspired reversible coversheet, and a 20-page artbook.

name: Persona 4 Colors
description: Persona 4 Colors is a game designed for Japanese feature phones that stars the cast of Persona 4 in a set of four minigames.

name: NBA 2K23: Championship Edition
description: Step back in time with era-specific visuals that captured Michael Jordan’s ascent from collegiate sensation to global icon with immersive Jordan Challenges chronicling his career-defining dominance.

name: Noob: Les Sans-Factions - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción
